andromeda.why: Refuses forced acceleration; accepts limits to preserve sovereignty.

arcturus.why: Constraint audit—define scope, buffers, and rules so mutation can be safe.

draco.why: Stoic posturing—using hardship to signal rank/control.

orion-light.why: Discipline to accept reality and prepare for the pulse.

pleiades.why: Gentle patience stabilizes morale amidst restriction.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching phase—personal acceptance, no transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Declines coercive deadlines; consent-first pacing within limits.

arcturus.why: Places people/resources for throughput under constraint—work design, cadence.

draco.why: Gatekeeping leakage—protects boundary so limited energy isn’t poached.

lyra.why: Economy of form—clean minimalism that fits the box.

orion-dark.why: Policy that suppresses life in the name of ‘order.’

orion-light.why: Honor the constraint; earn progress step by step.

pleiades.why: Supportive pacing and care make restraint workable.

sirius.why: Practical placement within limits; not yet a teaching channel.

arcturus.why: Regulation wobble—swinging between over-restriction and rule-breaking.

draco.why: Punitive enforcement to display dominance under stress.

lyra.why: Optics of ‘aesthetic austerity’ over true fit.

orion-dark.why: Using scarcity narratives to compel obedience.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of patience—reset timing; wait for the mutative pulse.

pleiades.why: Coddling that avoids necessary boundaries and timing.

sirius.why: Self-forging in constraint; no canon yet.

andromeda.why: Advocates limits that protect sovereignty rather than capture.

arcturus.why: Translates limits into protocol—windows, quotas, buffers, review cadence.

draco.why: Perimeter control—keeps opportunists from gaming the rules.

lyra.why: Graceful ritual—rhythm and form that make constraint feel right.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-conduct—endure the rule so mutation can arrive cleanly.

pleiades.why: Humane pacing preserves bonds under rationed energy.

sirius.why: Limitation protocol teaching—law of cycles, constraint, and proportion by example.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda that sanctifies oppressive limits.

arcturus.why: Projected to ‘make it work for everyone’ → burnout/scapegoat when refusing.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—apply proportionate constraint only where rightful.

pleiades.why: Appeasing leniency that erodes needed boundaries.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: ethics of constraint amid politics and myth.

andromeda.why: Liberates communities from capture-codes—returns to living limits that serve life.

arcturus.why: Elder stewardship—renewal/sunset of rules, review cycles, exception doctrine.

draco.why: Measured perimeter—firm against exploitation without tyranny.

lyra.why: Quiet majesty—culture tunes to dignified simplicity under wise limits.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—right timing to hold/release; honors the pulse of mutation.

pleiades.why: Altitude here is law and stewardship, not bonding/soothing.
